root: ^It is so nice to finally meet you.
^We are doing quite alright. I hope you are as well.

^We know that we have had few interactions with you. For that, we apologize. But now that there is a terror looming over us with this magic destabilization, we are sure that your intuition has become of great value.
^You hold a very high view of me.
^And we have no reason to believe that trust is misplaced.
^In a time like this, are you more focused on trust or deduction?

^Well you are certainly facing a higher number of cases and queries that you must attend to, and the magic crisis is only making things more challenging. So in your line of work, are you favoring a trust in the individual or a thorough investigation of the truth in all things?

IFOCUSMOREONTRUST: ^I personally find favor in trust. If you can trust someone, than they are more inclined to make themselves worthy of trust.
^So this is more of mental encouragement to benefit morality?
^Something along those lines. I maintain trust until it is revealed to be misplaced.
^Unfortunately, I also happen to be extraordinarily busy. I must be off to work.
IFOCUSMOREONDEDUCTION: ^A detective must be rational in all thing. In times like this, people are fearful and willing to make dangerous decisions. We must avoid this.
^So you do not act on impulse?
^I try not to, thought sometimes even I fail.
^Naturally, failure is inevitable. One must simply fight to be the best they can.
^A battle I struggle with every day.
^As do we all. You are an admirable person. Thank you for your time.
^Of course. Now I must be off to work.
